page.title: 13Transport
page.content: Brixton village is 7 miles from Plymouth City Centre where we buy furniture, electrical goods, books etc.from the big shops. Much of the entertainment is in Plymouth, roller skating, cinemas, theatre, swimming pools. Many of the parents work in Plymouth and some of their relations live there & in parts of the country. Most of our families have cars. We use a nationwide network of roads for business and holiday trips. There are main roads, wide & straight to enable us to go fast for long distances from the main roads. Smaller roads lead to towns and villages. We also use cycles motorcycles and buses. Goods are carried around our country by lorries and vans of different sizes. Some large lorries are allowed to carry up to 38 tonnes. Heavy traffic in Brixton main street causes dangerous problems.
